text: Arundel is a small settlement in the Timaru District, New Zealand. It is situated 15 kilometers north of Geraldine and east of Peel Forest. It is located on the southern side of the Rangitata River and has a timberyard in the village and is in the Carew Peel Forest school zone. == References == Category:Settlements in Canterbury Region Category:Timaru District
title: Arundel, New Zealand
